archiefmat.titel: Archief van de Notarissen ter standplaats Amsterdam
archiefmat.titel_eng: Archive of the notaries public of Amsterdam
archiefmat.notes:
The archives of notaries practising in Amsterdam during the 17th - 19th century contain documents related to inheritance issues, various contracts, slave trade, etc.; for instance, the archive of Stephanus Pelgrom, who was also secretary of the Society of Suriname from 1692-1711, holds many protocols regarding the slave trade.

(Contemporary) indices are available for documents from the 18th century; for documents from the 19th century, indices are rarely available.
